sections.description:
Plugin platform for managing fitness and nutrition coaching content.

We recommend using this plugin in conjunction with the Paid Memberships Pro plugin, and the PMPro Sequences plugin.
sections.changelog:
Change Log

0.8.6

  1. Didn't always load the user's previously saved data when loading workout definition.
  2. Make sure user is logged in before accepting AJAX save of workout data.
  3. Simplified userCanEdit()

0.8.5

  1. Fix: Height of the date navigator in the daily_progress shortcode output
  2. Fix: Layout of program definition settings in wp-admin
  3. Fix: Set default $users setting for program on load
  4. Fix: Make definition of e20r_activity page more robust for a program
  5. Fix: Didn't always load an appropriate length excerpt Fix: Didn't always select the url to the page containing the defined activity
  6. Fix: Didn't always add a 'Click to read' link
  7. Fix: Didn't load check-ins from article definition in getCheckins()
  8. Add debug for getActions()
  9. Fix: Loading of check-ins, actions & activity display.
  10. Add config setting for a program activity_page_id

0.8.4

  1. Didn't always add a new default assignment for the article.
  2. Didn't always load the correct status for the assignment.

0.8.3

  1. Fix numerous issues when listing [daily_progress type='assignment'] output
  2. 0.8.2 - Fix program data load and add highlight around lesson complete button in daily assignment.
  3. 0.8.1 - Fix: Correctly handle next weeks activity archive.

0.8.0

  1. Enh: e20r_activity_archive shortcode support

0.7.1

  1. Bumped to test auto-update
    2. >

0.7.0

  1. Added automatic update functionality
